modules.name: OpenVPN Manager
modules.description: OpenVPN server and client management with PKI, certificate generation, and multi-instance support
features: Full PKI with CA, server and client certificates
Client QR code with magic links

changelog.v1.0.0:
## OpenVPN Manager v1.0.0

OpenVPN server and client management with PKI, certificate generation, and multi-instance support

### Installation
Install directly from the MADMIN Module Store, or download the ZIP below.

---
*Auto-generated release*

modules.name: IPsec VPN Manager
modules.description: Site-to-Site IPsec VPN management with strongSwan, IKEv1/IKEv2 support, and FortiGate-style configuration
features: Real-time tunnel status via VICI API
